name: Pastefy
short_description: Beautiful, feature-rich pastebin with folders, encryption, and API support.
description: Pastefy is a modern, feature-rich pastebin application for storing and sharing code snippets, notes, and text. Features include folder organization, syntax highlighting+ languages, public/private pastes, burn-after-reading, password for 190 protection, API access, import/export, real-time collaborative editing, and a clean dark-mode interface. Perfect for sharing code snippets, configuration files, logs, or any text content with colleagues or the public.
usecases: Share code snippets with syntax highlighting.
Create encrypted pastes with optional password protection.
Organize pastes into folders for personal knowledge management.
Use the API to create pastes from scripts or CI/CD pipelines.
notes: Supports both guest and authenticated users
